<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Right-hand Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=5602) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that the flesh of the left side is deadly and poisonous. You can deal 1 slashing damage to yourself to feed someone blood from your right side and [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2396) or take 2d8 damage to [Treat Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=2397) or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=2399); in either case, you don't need a [healer's toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2727), and you gain a +1 item bonus to your check. Blood from your left side causes the check to critically fail automatically.
name: Right-hand Blood
